name: Bolls together
description:
This is an game for the GMTK game jam! The theme is joined together, and we made it so that blocks are joined together. They try to move away from each other as much x and y distance apart as they were from their starting position. 

hint lvl 4: try to make an elevator.

hint lvl 5: use an block from above to use the buttons

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Channels: Andy:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0Q_iFfmleBegltI0RFoWgg, Andy and Kenley:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpuKwQM_VAD0vH4rupiNkBA,  Sam: https://www.twitch.tv/sam_eleon
